timeline.bodyText: If this is required for the regular case to work, then I vote for doing it from within the extension via new NativeImageSystemPropertyBuildItem("quarkus.ssl.native", "true) so that the users do not need to bother.
timeline.author: ppalaga
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@

+
+# Quarkus
+quarkus.native.enable-https-url-handler=true

replies.bodyText:
Yep - let me do that 👍
Actually, I think we can do likewise on a couple of other extensions. I'll check once we get this one merged.
replies.author: jamesnetherton
